summary: Text objects for ouputs of diff(1)
name: textobj-diff
description:
*textobj-diff* is a Vim plugin to provide text objects for outputs of diff(1).
Currently it supports the following formats:
- diff --context
- diff --unified
- git diff


Requirements:
- Vim 7.2 or later
- |textobj-user| 0.3.7 or later (vimscript#2100)

Latest version:
http://github.com/kana/vim-textobj-diff

Document in HTML format:
http://kana.github.com/config/vim/textobj-diff.html
